channel.title: CVE Feed for Micro Focus -- ArcSight Management Center
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Micro Focus -- ArcSight Management Center

item.title: CVE-2018-6500|2024-08-05T06:01:49.348Z -- micro%20focus -- arcsight%20management%20center
item.description: A potential Directory Traversal Security vulnerability has been identified in ArcSight Management Center (ArcMC) in all versions prior to 2.81. This vulnerability could be remotely exploited to allow Directory Traversal.
